abstract: Twitter is most interested in striking distribution partnerships with big Internet and media companies, not in being acquired or striking an advertising deal, says company director Fred Wilson.
snippet: Twitter is most interested in striking distribution partnerships with big Internet and media companies, not in being acquired or striking an advertising deal, says company director Fred Wilson.
lead_paragraph: Update | 8:51 p.m.  Related Bits post about Oprah Winfrey endorsing Twitter.

headline.main: Twitter Wants Distribution Deals, Not a Buyout
